ack.p: This work has been developed under the MEV09 project and the research platform of Veterinary of Epidemiology and Microbiology Laboratory. We would like to thank FAO for providing reference sera and technical support. We are also grateful to all field veterinarians for their help in filling out the questionnaire and collecting the animal samples, also Dr Ondrej Libiger (PhD, Research Associate, Scripps Translational Science Institute California, USA) for copyediting the manuscript.
